sentence.Network_en: The arena of physics is spacetime.
sentence.Network_cn: 物理学的活动舞台是空时.

sentence.Network_en: In the submicroscopic world , there is little prospect at present that curved spacetime will reveal itself.
sentence.Network_cn: 目前在亚微观世界展现弯曲空时的希望不大.

sentence.Network_en: Lying dormant thus far in our view of the world is spacetime itself.
sentence.Network_cn: 到现在为止,在我们的世界观中,空时本身“正在休眠”.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 的时空 (spacetime) 将重力效应引进到相对
他们管这叫“空时”（spacetime），比物质能量的密度小一些。空时比物质能量频率高一些。
根据爱恩斯坦的「狭义相对论」，我们的世界是一个四维时空(Spacetime)，其中三维是空间，其余一维是时间(注1)。虽然人类自古 …

list.abs: 词条:量子泡沫量子泡沫也叫时空泡沫(spacetime foam),是惠勒(John Wheeler)1195年根据量子力学提出的概念。量子泡沫是极小尺度(普朗克长度量级)下量子振荡的定性描述.
Another possible effect of discrete spacetime involves high energy cosmic rays ., 离散时空的另一个可能的效应 , 牵涉到极高能量的宇宙射线.
parallel circuit 并联电路parallel spacetime 平行时空parallelehedra 平行[多]面体
孪生子吊诡：twin paradox弯曲时空：curved spacetime碱基对：base pair
in 1981 he showed that there is a close analogy between the propagation of sound in moving fluid and that of light in a curved spacetime .1981年，他证明了声波在流体中的传播，和光在弯曲空间中的传播有极为接近的类比。

auth_sentence.content: In other words, nothing can move in spacetime.
auth_sentence.res_content: In other words, nothing can move in spacetime.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In other words, nothing can move in spacetime.

auth_sentence.content: It is consistent with an accelerating expansion of spacetime.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is consistent with an accelerating expansion of spacetime.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is consistent with an accelerating expansion of spacetime.

auth_sentence.content: In this spacetime there will be blackholes and wormholes.
